message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the problem of hate speech detection using natural language processing techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes novel methods leveraging knowledge-based generalizations for bias-free learning, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves designing algorithms for identifying the set of words which the model stereotypes, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with mitigating bias, which falls under the category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). Finally, the paper involves analyzing the effect of knowledge-based generalizations on performance, which falls under the category of cs.CY (Computers and Society).
